title: Ng Tsang Lau
text: Ng Tsang Lau () was a <a href="cape%20%28geography%29">cape</a> on the south west corner of <a href="Tsing%20Yi">Tsing Yi Island</a>, <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a>. Its shore was reclaimed for the <a href="Mobil">Mobil</a> oil depot. It is near <a href="Tai%20Nam%20Wan">Tai Nam Wan</a> on the island.
